languages.text: "Как и твоя, {name}. Я прибыла со щедрыми дарами для твоего протектората. Это — знак благодарности за то, что ты не соблазнил{mf|ся|ась} на {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}уговоры{/d} главарей Футфола и не стал{mf||а} мне препятствовать. Вольные Торговцы должны выступать единой силой против ереси и непокорства. Надеюсь, ты станешь мне верн{mf|ым|ой} союзни{mf|ком|цей} и не пойдешь по стопам Теодоры". {n}Очередной удар тика перекашивает лицо Инцендии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Как и твоя, {name}. Я прибыла со щедрыми дарами для твоей торговой империи. Это — знак благодарности за то, что ты не соблазнил{mf|ся|ась} на уговоры главарей Футфола и не стал{mf||а} мне препятствовать. Вольные Торговцы должны выступать единой силой против ереси и непокорства. Надеюсь, ты станешь мне верн{mf|ым|ой} союзни{mf|ком|цей} и не пойдешь по стопам Теодоры". {n}Очередной удар тика перекашивает лицо Инцендии.{/n}

languages.text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как и твоя, {name}. Я прибыла со щедрыми дарами для твоего протектората. Это — знак благодарности за то, что ты не соблазнил{mf|ся|ась} на {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}уговоры{/d} главарей Футфола и не стал{mf||а} мне препятствовать. Вольные Торговцы должны выступать единой силой против ереси и непокорства. Надеюсь, ты станешь мне верн{mf|ым|ой} союзни{mf|ком|цей} и не пойдешь по стопам Теодоры". {n}Очередной удар тика перекашивает лицо Инцендии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As is yours, {name}. I have come bearing generous gifts for your trade empire. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for not having been tempted by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I do hope you will become my trusted ally and will not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's face contorts, struck by another tic.{/n}

"As is yours, {name}. I have come bearing generous gifts for your trade empire. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for not having been tempted by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I do hope you will become my trusted ally and will not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's face contorts, struck by another tic.{/n}

Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

"As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your trade empire. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for not being tempted by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

"As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for not being tempted by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

languages.text: 「お互い様だ、{name}。気前よくみやげを持って保護領に来られるのは、フットフォールの主人の言葉に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}惑わされないでいてくれたこと{/d}に対する感謝のしるしだ。自由開拓者は、異端と頑迷に連帯して立ち向かわねばならない。お前が信頼の置ける仲間となり、シオドーラと同じ轍を踏まないことを望んでいるよ」{n}インセンディアのチック症がまた始まり、その顔が歪む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お互い様だ、{name}。気前よくみやげを持って保護領に来られるのは、フットフォールの主人の言葉に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}惑わされないでいてくれたこと{/d}に対する感謝のしるしだ。自由開拓者は、異端と頑迷に連帯して立ち向かわねばならない。お前が信頼の置ける仲間となり、シオドーラと同じ轍を踏まないことを望んでいるよ」{n}インセンディアのチック症がまた始まり、その顔が歪む。{/n}

languages.text: “彼此彼此，{name}。我为你的王朝带来了一份厚礼，这也是我个人的心意，感谢你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}没有被落脚港统治者的花言巧语所迷惑{/d}，也没有选择与我为敌。行商浪人必须团结一致，对抗异端邪说，切忌恣意妄为。我希望你能成为值得信赖的盟友，不要步西奥多拉的后尘。”{n}因森蒂娅的面部再次抽搐了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “彼此彼此，{name}。我为你的王朝带来了一份厚礼，这也是我个人的心意，感谢你没有被落脚港统治者的花言巧语所迷惑，也没有选择与我为敌。行商浪人必须团结一致，对抗异端邪说，切忌恣意妄为。我希望你能成为值得信赖的盟友，不要步西奥多拉的后尘。”{n}因森蒂娅的面部再次抽搐了一下。{/n}

languages.text: «Y el suyo, {name}. Traigo regalos generosos para su protectorado. Es una muestra de mi gratitud por {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}no dejarse tentar{/d} por las palabras de los amos de Paso y volverse en mi contra. Los Comerciantes Independientes debemos unirnos para luchar contra la herejía y otras degeneraciones. Espero que se convierta en un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} fiel en vez de seguir los pasos de Theodora». {n}El tic de Incendia vuelve a deformar su cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y el suyo, {name}. Traigo regalos generosos para su protectorado. Es una muestra de mi gratitud por no dejarse tentar por las palabras de los amos de Paso y volverse en mi contra. Los Comerciantes Independientes debemos unirnos para luchar contra la herejía y otras degeneraciones. Espero que se convierta en un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a} fiel en vez de seguir los pasos de Theodora». {n}El tic de Incendia vuelve a deformar su cara.{/n}

languages.text: « Moi de même, {name}. J'apporte de généreux présents pour votre protectorat en témoignage de ma gratitude, puisque vous ne vous êtes {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}pas {mf|laissé|laissée} influencer{/d} par les paroles des maîtres de Castel ni {mf|opposé|opposée} à moi. Les libres-marchands doivent rester unis face à l'hérésie, aussi acharnée soit-elle. J'espère pouvoir vous compter parmi mes alliés de confiance et je souhaite de tout mon cœur que vous ne suiviez pas les traces de Théodora. » {n}Un tic vient de nouveau contorsionner le visage d'Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Moi de même, {name}. J'apporte de généreux présents pour votre protectorat en témoignage de ma gratitude, puisque vous ne vous êtes pas {mf|laissé|laissée} influencer par les paroles des maîtres de Castel ni {mf|opposé|opposée} à moi. Les libres-marchands doivent rester unis face à l'hérésie, aussi acharnée soit-elle. J'espère pouvoir vous compter parmi mes alliés de confiance et je souhaite de tout mon cœur que vous ne suiviez pas les traces de Théodora. » {n}Un tic vient de nouveau contorsionner le visage d'Incendia.{/n}

languages.text: "Und ich die Eure, {name}. Ich bringe großzügige Geschenke für Euer Protektorat. Sie sind ein Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit, weil Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}nicht auf die Worte der Herren von Footfall gehört habt{/d} und nicht gegen mich vorgegangen seid. Freihändler müssen gegen Ketzerei und Abweichlertum zusammenstehen. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet {mf|mein vertrauter Verbündeter|meine vertraute Verbündete} und folgt nicht Theodoras Weg." {n}Incendias Tick verzerrt erneut für einen Moment ihr Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ich die Eure, {name}. Ich bringe großzügige Geschenke für Euer Protektorat. Sie sind ein Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit, weil Ihr nicht auf die Worte der Herren von Footfall gehört habt und nicht gegen mich vorgegangen seid. Freihändler müssen gegen Ketzerei und Abweichlertum zusammenstehen. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet {mf|mein vertrauter Verbündeter|meine vertraute Verbündete} und folgt nicht Theodoras Weg." {n}Incendias Tick verzerrt erneut für einen Moment ihr Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: "Bilmukabele {name}. Protektoran için cömert hediyeler getirdim. Binliman'ın efendilerinin sözlerine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}kanıp{/d} bana karşı gelmediğin için duyduğum minnettarlığın bir işareti olarak gör. Hür Tacirler, kâfirlik ve dikkafalılığa karşı birleşmelidir. Umarım Theodora'nın izinden gitmeyip güvenilir bir müttefikim olursun." {n}İncendia'nın tiki tekrar nüksedip yüzünü çarpıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As is yours, {name}. I come bearing generous gifts for your protectorate. It is a sign of my gratitude to you for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}not being tempted{/d} by the words of Footfall's masters and for not going against me. Rogue Traders must unite against heresy and waywardness. I hope you will become my trusted ally and not follow in Theodora's footsteps." {n}Incendia's tic strikes again, contorting her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bilmukabele {name}. Protektoran için cömert hediyeler getirdim. Binliman efendilerinin sözlerinden cezbolup bana karşı gelmediğin için sana minnettarlığımın bir işareti olarak gör. Hür Tacirler kâfirlik ve dik kafalılığa karşı birleşmelidir. Umarım güvenilir bir müttefikim olur da Theodora'nın izinden gitmezsin." {n}İncendia'nın tiki tekrar nüksedip yüzünü çarpıtıyor.{/n}
